verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> that <WH834> came <WH1961> to <WH413> Joel <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Pethuel. <WH6602>

Hear <WH8085> this, <WH2063> ye old men, <WH2205> and give ear, <WH238> all <WH3605> ye inhabitants <WH3427> of the land. <WH776> Hath this <WH2063> been <WH1961> in your days, <WH3117> or even <WH518> in the days <WH3117> of your fathers? <WH1>
Tell <WH5608> ye your children <WH1121> of <WH5921> it, and let your children <WH1121> tell their children, <WH1121> and their children <WH1121> another <WH312> generation. <WH1755>

That which the palmerworm <WH1501> hath left <WH3499> hath the locust <WH697> eaten; <WH398> and that which the locust <WH697> hath left <WH3499> hath the cankerworm <WH3218> eaten; <WH398> and that which the cankerworm <WH3218> hath left <WH3499> hath the caterpillar <WH2625> eaten. <WH398>

Awake, <WH6974> ye drunkards, <WH7910> and weep; <WH1058> and howl, <WH3213> all <WH3605> ye drinkers <WH8354> of wine, <WH3196> because of <WH5921> the new wine; <WH6071> for <WH3588> it is cut off <WH3772> from your mouth. <WH4480> <WH6310>

For <WH3588> a nation <WH1471> is come up <WH5927> upon <WH5921> my land, <WH776> strong, <WH6099> and without <WH369> number, <WH4557> whose teeth <WH8127> are the teeth <WH8127> of a lion, <WH738> and he hath the cheek teeth <WH4973> of a great lion. <WH3833>

He hath laid <WH7760> my vine <WH1612> waste, <WH8047> and barked <WH7111> my fig tree: <WH8384> he hath made it clean bare, <WH2834> <WH2834> and cast it away; <WH7993> the branches <WH8299> thereof are made white. <WH3835>
Lament <WH421> like a virgin <WH1330> girded <WH2296> with sackcloth <WH8242> for <WH5921> the husband <WH1167> of her youth. <WH5271>

The meat offering <WH4503> and the drink offering <WH5262> is cut off <WH3772> from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of the LORD; <WH3068> the priests, <WH3548> the LORD's <WH3068> ministers, <WH8334> mourn. <WH56>

The field <WH7704> is wasted, <WH7703> the land <WH127> mourneth; <WH56> for <WH3588> the corn <WH1715> is wasted: <WH7703> the new wine <WH8492> is dried up, <WH3001> the oil <WH3323> languisheth. <WH535>

Be ye ashamed, <WH954> O ye husbandmen; <WH406> howl, <WH3213> O ye vinedressers, <WH3755> for <WH5921> the wheat <WH2406> and for <WH5921> the barley; <WH8184> because <WH3588> the harvest <WH7105> of the field <WH7704> is perished. <WH6>

The vine <WH1612> is dried up, <WH3001> and the fig tree <WH8384> languisheth; <WH535> the pomegranate tree, <WH7416> the palm tree <WH8558> also, <WH1571> and the apple tree, <WH8598> even all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of the field, <WH7704> are withered: <WH3001> because <WH3588> joy <WH8342> is withered away <WH3001> from <WH4480> the sons <WH1121> of men. <WH120>

Gird <WH2296> yourselves, and lament, <WH5594> ye priests: <WH3548> howl, <WH3213> ye ministers <WH8334> of the altar: <WH4196> come, <WH935> lie all night <WH3885> in sackcloth, <WH8242> ye ministers <WH8334> of my God: <WH430> for <WH3588> the meat offering <WH4503> and the drink offering <WH5262> is withheld <WH4513> from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of your God. <WH430>

Sanctify <WH6942> ye a fast, <WH6685> call <WH7121> a solemn assembly, <WH6116> gather <WH622> the elders <WH2205> and all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> into the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and cry <WH2199> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068>
Alas <WH162> for the day! <WH3117> for <WH3588> the day <WH3117> of the LORD <WH3068> is at hand, <WH7138> and as a destruction <WH7701> from the Almighty <WH4480> <WH7706> shall it come. <WH935>
Is not <WH3808> the meat <WH400> cut off <WH3772> before <WH5048> our eyes, <WH5869> yea, joy <WH8057> and gladness <WH1524> from the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of our God? <WH430>

The seed <WH6507> is rotten <WH5685> under <WH8478> their clods, <WH4053> the garners <WH214> are laid desolate, <WH8074> the barns <WH4460> are broken down; <WH2040> for <WH3588> the corn <WH1715> is withered. <WH3001>

How <WH4100> do the beasts <WH929> groan! <WH584> the herds <WH5739> of cattle <WH1241> are perplexed, <WH943> because <WH3588> they have no <WH369> pasture; <WH4829> yea, <WH1571> the flocks <WH5739> of sheep <WH6629> are made desolate. <WH816>

O LORD, <WH3068> to <WH413> thee will I cry: <WH7121> for <WH3588> the fire <WH784> hath devoured <WH398> the pastures <WH4999> of the wilderness, <WH4057> and the flame <WH3852> hath burned <WH3857> all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of the field. <WH7704>

The beasts <WH929> of the field <WH7704> cry <WH6165> also <WH1571> unto <WH413> thee: for <WH3588> the rivers <WH650> of waters <WH4325> are dried up, <WH3001> and the fire <WH784> hath devoured <WH398> the pastures <WH4999> of the wilderness. <WH4057>
